SA14n1222:32: tadyathā- “prathamacittotpādamupādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ carannātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃśca dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati dānasya ca varṇa bhāṣate |
SA14n1222:33: ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ |
SA14n1222:34: sa tena dānena mahāntaṃ bhogaskandha pratilabhya dānaṃ dadāti vigatamatsareṇa cittena annaṃ pānaṃ vastraṃ vilepanaṃ śayanamupāśrayamanyadvā pariṣkāropakaraṇaṃ dadāti tadarthinām |

SA14n1222:41: yasya ca svabhāvo nāsti so'bhāva iti dānapāramitayā'nupūrvakriyā |

SA14n1222:47: api ca puṇyamapi loke dharma ucyate |

SA14n1222:54: ye cānye tāsu caranti teṣāṃ varṇavādi bhavati samanujñaḥ |
SA14n1222:57: so'bhāvasvabhāvenaiva sarvadharmānabhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartya yāvatsarvasattvān parimocayati |

SA14n1222:62: yosau bhagavataḥ srāvakasaṃghaścatvāraḥ puruṣayugā aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalāḥ svabhāvastasya nāsti |
SA14n1222:63: yasya dharmasya svabhāvo nāsti so'bhāva ityamanasikāro saṃghānusmṛtiḥ |
SA14n1222:64: tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā'khaṇḍe'cchidre'kalmāṣe'parāmṛṣṭe bhujiṣye vijñapraśaste samādhisaṃvartanīye śīle sthitvā tacchīlamabhāvasvabhāvato manasikartavyamityamanasikāro śīlānusmṛtiḥ |
SA14n1222:65: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carannāmiṣaṃ vā aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā tyajan sarvaṃ tadabhāvasvabhāvato manasikarotītyamanasikāro yo(tyā)
SA14n1222:67: ye te devāḥ śrotaāpannāścāturmahārājakāyikeṣu yāvatparanirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapannāste sarve'bhāvasvabhāvā ityanusmṛtiramanasikāro devatānusmṛtiḥ |“

SA14n1222:878: [207] karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam |
SA14n1222:883: yāvantaḥ sthalajalāntarikṣacarāṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāyavāksaṃgṛhītā dharmāḥ sattvānāṃ vinayanāya bhagavatā ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu nirmitāḥ te sarvadharmāsteṣāmaparyantatayā bhagavataḥ prajñāyā aparyantatā veditavyā |
SA14n1222:886: yathā tathāgatena nirmitāḥ kāyā anantāstathā teṣāṃ śūnyatāpyanantā |
SA14n1222:890: yathā teṣāṃ kāyavācau nirmite tathā cittacaitasikā api kinna nirmīyante ?
SA14n1222:902: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ yathā deśitaṃ dharmamālambya prātipakṣikāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante |
SA14n1222:903: taiśca teṣāṃ vikṣepakā akuśalā dharmāḥ prahīyante |
SA14n1222:906: atha ye nirmitāste kathaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyāḥ ?
SA14n1222:910: svakāyavacca gamanavyāhārādiṣu duṣkareṣu vyāpa[ā]raṇāttepi kāyā ityayaṃ bhagavato nairmāṇikaḥ kāyaḥ |
SA14n1222:918: tasya dharmaḥ sarvāśāparipūraṇatayā sarvaparapravādimṛgabhīṣaṇatayā ca siṃhanāda ityucyate |
SA14n1222:922: tayā bhagavataḥ prajñā gantavyā pāragamanāt pāramitā veditavyetyarthaḥ |
SA14n1222:926: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe ||8-34 ||
SA14n1222:939: bhagavāṃstānvigrahānnirmimīte ye nārakāṇāṃ narakāgninirvāpaṇena dharmadeśanayā ca tathā tiraścāṃ svamāṃsarudhirādidānena tathā pretānāmannapānādidānena dharmadeśanayā ca cittamabhipra sādya tena cābhiprasādena svagatibhyaścyutānāṃ devamanuṣyeṣūpapādayanti |
SA14n1222:940: devānapi hīnayānādhimuktikān dharmadeśanayābhiprasādya manuṣyeṣūpapannān yāvacchrāvakabodhau pratyekabodhau ca pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyantīti gatipraśamanakarma ||
SA14n1222:941: ye ca manuṣyān bāhyādhyātmikeṣvāmiṣadāneṣu laukikalokotareṣu ca dharmadāneṣu,
SA14n1222:947: yathā hi māyākāro vicitrāṇi vastūni yāvabhdakṣyabhojyāni nirmāya lokaṃ toṣayati |
SA14n1222:948: sa ca loko na jānāti sarvametadadravyakamiti |
SA14n1222:949: yaśca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na sa dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ kiñcitpaśyati na sattvaṃ nāpi sattvaprajñaptiṃ dharmāṇāmapi nairātmyāditi sattvārthayāthātmyaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:950: sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃśca dāne niyojayati dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate |
SA14n1222:951: ye cānye dānaṃ dadati teṣā ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ |
SA14n1222:952: evamātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣatītyādi vācyamiti ṣaṭpāramitāniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:953: ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate |
SA14n1222:954: ātmanā ca pañcaśikṣāpadāni yāvadātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayatīti vācyamiti buddhamārganiveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:955: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pāramitādīn sarvadharmān deśayati |
SA14n1222:956: teṣāṃ koṭitrayasya phalasya ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ deśayati |
SA14n1222:958: tataste bhūyasyā mātrayā prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimadhigacchantīti prakṛtiśūnyatāniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:959: prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na cānyā prakṛtiśūnyatā anye dharmāḥ |
SA14n1222:963: yatpunarabhisambudhya dharmā deśitāḥ skandhadhātvādayo vā yāvatsarvākārajñatā vā tatsarvaṃ lokavyavahāreṇeti sāṅketikajñānaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:964: yadi pāramitādiṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate tathāpi samyaksambodhaye na śaknoti |
SA14n1222:965: yadi punasteṣveva carati teṣāṃ ca koṭitrayaṃ phalaṃ ca nopalabhate |
SA14n1222:967: yadyapi bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvaṃ sattvaprajñaptiṃ ca nopalabhate tathāpi saṃvṛtyā paśyati sattvān vastūpalambhena saṃkliṣyamānān |
SA14n1222:968: sa tāṃstatprahāṇāya triṣu yāneṣu paripācayatīti sattvaparipākaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:974: na ca teṣu tatphaleṣu vā gantavyamiti sarvābhiniveśaprahāṇaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:976: yato bodhi eva mārgaḥ mārga eva bodhiḥ |
SA14n1222:977: bodhisattva eva tarhi buddhaḥ syāditi cet |
SA14n1222:978: yadā sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamasamādhau sthitvā bodhisattva ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā samyaksambodhimadhigacchati tadā sa eva tathāgataḥ sarvadarśī sarvajña iti nirdiśyata iti bodhiprāptiniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:979: sa ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca daśākuśalasaṃgṛhītāni dauḥśīlyāni ṣaṭpāramitāvipakṣāṃśca hīnayānaphalānāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sākṣātkriyāspṛhayoravakāśaṃ,
SA14n1222:980: skandhadhātvādisāśravānāśravasarvadharmasaṃjñādauṣṭhulyāni ca nivārya svayaṃ ca pāramitādiṣu sarvakuśaladharmeṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati parānapi pratiṣṭhāpayati |
SA14n1222:981: tacca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇakṛtvā ātmanaḥ samyaksambodhau ca sarvākārāyāṃ ca svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhau pariṇāmayati |
SA14n1222:982: praṇidhānāni ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye yathā sūtraṃ karotīti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:983: prathamacittotpādika eva bodhisattvaḥ samyaksambodhau niyato bhavati |
SA14n1222:985: yaḥ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caturṣu vāpramāṇeṣu carati daśa cākuśalān dharmān prahāya tiṣṭhati |
SA14n1222:986: aṣṭau tasyākṣaṇā na sambhavanti kiṃ punarapāyopapattiḥ |
SA14n1222:990: tadyathā tathāgataḥ paramavaśitvalābhātsarvalokadhātuṣu yugapadanantānātmabhāvān parārthāya nirmimīta iti samyaksambodhiniyataniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:991: sa hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu sattvānāmartha karoti na ca lipyate |
SA14n1222:995: trīnimāndharmānasau nopalabhate śūnyatāyāṃ ca sthitaḥ sarvaśukladharmeṣu sthito bhavati |
SA14n1222:1000: ye te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo ye ca teṣu tathāgatāḥ sarve te svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kevalaṃ nāmasaṅketena prajñapyate |
SA14n1222:1002: yadi tu kasyacicchūnyatā na syāt prādeśikī syāt |
SA14n1222:1003: yatastu na pradeśikī tataḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyā iti |
SA14n1222:1004: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaḍabhijñā abhinirharati |
SA14n1222:1005: yāsu sthitvā daśadiksarvatathāgatānupasaṃkrāmati paryupāste tebhyaśca dharma śṛṇoti teṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayatyanabhiniviṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1222:1007: sa divyena cakṣuṣā daśadiglokadhātuṣu sattvān dṛṣṭvā sadyo'bhijñayā tatra gatvā tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati |
SA14n1222:1008: divyena śrotradhātunā daśadiksarvabuddhānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvodgṛhya sattvebhyo deśayati |
SA14n1222:1009: cetaḥparyāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cittāni viditvā yathācittamebhyo dharma deśayati |
SA14n1222:1013: sa tābhirabhijñābhiryaṃ yamevākāṃkṣatyātmabhāvaṃ sattvānāmarthāya pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tameva pratigṛṇhāti |
SA14n1222:1014: na ca tatra sukhaduḥkhānunayapratighairūpalipyata iti daśadigbuddhopāsanādiniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:1017: yadi teṣu carati koṭitrayaṃ ca teṣāṃ nopalabhate |
SA14n1222:1018: yadi cātmanaḥ samyaksambodhaye sarvasattvānāṃ cāgratāyai tān samyakpariṇāmayati |
SA14n1222:1019: yadyamī bodhisattvadharmāḥ katame tarhi buddhadharmāḥ ? eta eva |
SA14n1222:1025: na hi sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānanti |
SA14n1222:1026: ajānantaḥ pudgalaṃ dharmāṃśca kalpayantaḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā |
SA14n1222:1029: kecitpunaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ parijñāya sugatidurgatīḥ prahāya nirvāṇamadhigacchanti |
SA14n1222:1030: bodhisattvāḥ pāramitādīn kuśalān dharmānparipūrayantaḥ krameṇa daśabhūmīnadhigamyaikakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñāyā sarvadharmānabhisambudhya buddhā bhagavanto bhavantīti karmaphalasambandhāvipraṇāśananiveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:1033: yā teṣāṃ samatā tathatā niḥsvabhāvatā sā na kaściddharmamupalabhate satyaparyāpannamanyaṃ vā |
SA14n1222:1034: tataḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyanniyāyamamavakramya gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati dhyānānyutpādayatyapramāṇānyārūpyasamāpattīśca |
SA14n1222:1035: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā duḥkhaṃ parijānāti samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
SA14n1222:1041: yadi bhagavannabhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā kathaṃ bodhisattvena rūpādau śikṣitavyaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmeṣu ?
SA14n1222:1049: idaṃ rūpamiyaṃ vedanā yāvadamī buddhadharmā iti bhāvaḥ ||
SA14n1222:1063: na tasyotpādanirodhau tato na sa svabhāvaḥ ||
SA14n1222:1065: kiṃ punarbhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena na santyeva rūpādayo yāvadbuddhadharmāḥ ?
SA14n1222:1071: sacetsaskāranimittaṃ vastu sa evānabhilāpyo dhāturiti vyāhatametat ||
SA14n1222:1082: yadyasau saṃskāranimittādanyaḥ syādapīdānī sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ parinirvāyuḥ samyaksambodhi cābhisambudhyeran |
SA14n1222:1085: anabhilāpyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamāne yadi saṃskāranimittaṃ nopalabhyate tatkimasannopalabhyate sadvā ?
SA14n1222:1087: yadi vikalpato grahaṇameti na vikalpeṣvapagateṣu tadā parikalpamātraṃ taditi na tasya sattvamasattvaṃ vā |
SA14n1222:1091: yaduta parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ dharmatā rūpam |
SA14n1222:1095: tatra yā saṃskāranimitte vastuni rūpamiti nāmasaṅketavyavahāraṃ niśritya rūpasvabhāvatayā parikalpanā tatparikalpitaṃ rūpam |
SA14n1222:1097: yā punastena parikalpitena rūpeṇa tasya vikalpitarūpasya nityakālaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā nairātmyaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭistaddharmatārūpam |
SA14n1222:1106: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yaduta rūpamiti yāvadbuddhadharmā iti tatkatham ?
SA14n1222:1116: evamantadvayaṃ prahāya madhyamāpratipadaṃ pratipannasya rūpe yāvadbuddhadharmeṣu kathaṃ lakṣaṇaparijñā lakṣaṇaprahāṇa lakṣaṇasākṣātkriyā lakṣaṇabhāvanā ca ?
SA14n1222:1118: rūpasya yanna parijñānaṃ nāparijñānaṃ tadevāsya parijñānam |
SA14n1222:1119: evaṃ yāvadyā bhāvanā nābhāvanā saiva bhāvanā |
SA14n1222:1124: gambhīrameṣāṃ nirvāṇaṃ yato na tannirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇam |
SA14n1222:1125: tatkatham ? yataḥ parānārabhya saṃsārāparityāga eṣāṃ na nirvāṇam |
SA14n1222:1130: sa tarhi saṃsarati nirvāti ceti na yuktam ?
SA14n1222:1132: yā śūnyatā yā cānupalambhapratiṣṭhānatā so'sya nirvāṇāparityāgaḥ ||
SA14n1222:1142: kinnu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇāmekāntena nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati ?
SA14n1222:1145: asti sā gotrajātiryā ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate |
SA14n1222:1156: tasya tatprāptaye yā upapattayo na tāḥ karmakleśavaśena |
SA14n1222:1157: api tvacintyāṃ nirvāṇapāragāminīmarhato'pyupapattiṃ prajñapayāmi yā prathamā gotrajātiḥ sā bodhisattvānām ||
SA14n1222:1161: yadamī śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvādibhiḥ sarvalokasampattibhiranarthino'nuttarāyāṃ bodhau kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayanti |
SA14n1222:1165: ktisukhamanavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛtisukhaṃ ca tatsarva sarvasattvasādhāraṇamicchanto'nuttarāyāṃ bodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti saṃsārāparityāgatayā |
SA14n1222:1174: dharmāṇāmabhāvasvabhāvamajānantaḥ sattvā viparyāsasamutthitairvikalpaiḥ karmāṇi kṛtvā yathākarmaphalāni prāpnuvanti |
SA14n1222:1181: tataḥ saṃkliśyante ca lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthataḥ |
SA14n1222:1182: na hi kiñcidvastvasti vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātrakamapi yatra sthitvā karma kuryuḥ |
SA14n1222:1185: tacca lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahriyate na paramārthato'nabhilāpyatvāditi vyavadānaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:1186: yadyapi svapnamāyopamāḥ sarvadharmā nirvastukāstathāpi tadajānantaḥ sattvā vastvabhiniveśena karmāṇi kṛtvā sugatidurgati gacchanti |
SA14n1222:1187: atasteṣāṃ viparyāsaprahāṇāya bodhisattvo bodhau cittamutpādya saṃsāre carati |
SA14n1222:1190: na dvayenābhisamayo nādvayena ! eṣa evātrābhisamayo yatra na dvayaṃ nādvayam ||
SA14n1222:1204: yaśca saṃskṛto dhāturyaścāsaṃskṛta ubhāvetau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau na rūpiṇau anidarśanāvapratighāvekalakṣaṇau yadutālakṣaṇau“ iti saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāvyatibhedena jñānaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:1207: te na śrāvakairna pratyekabuddhairna tathāgataiḥ kṛtāḥ |
SA14n1222:1208: yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā tannirvāṇaṃ“ iti nirvāṇaniveśanakarma ||
SA14n1222:1213: “nyāyo hi sācāro dharmaḥ svabhāvaśca dharmākhyaḥ“ iti vacanāt |
SA14n1222:1216: daśadiksarvalokadhātusthiteṣu sarvasattveṣu sarvairākāraiḥ yathā bhājanamavicchedena yāvadākāśaṃ pravṛttiḥ |
SA14n1222:1217: tayā tajjanikayā bhagavataḥ prajñāpāramitāyā akopyatā tādṛśyeva veditavyā |
SA14n1222:1219: samudrāparyantatāvākyādibhirakopyatāvākyaparyantaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyā ye viśeṣā uktāsteṣāṃ pāramārthikaṃ jñānamānupūrvyā darśayitukāmaḥ pṛcchati tatkasya hetoriti |
SA14n1222:1226: tathā hi ye ca rūpādayo yā ca teṣāṃ śūnyatā yā ca prajñāpāramitā sarva ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo'nidarśanā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā iti bhāvaḥ |
SA14n1222:1241: yāni punaḥ sthānāni cintayan bālaḥ śaktikṣayāt khinna unmādyet mūrcchet maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet tāni sthānānyacintyāni teṣu tulayiṣyati |
SA14n1222:1242: yathaitāni bhagavatā paramayogīśvareṇa dṛṣṭāni tathaiva nirdiṣṭāni |
SA14n1222:1253: ahamiti mameti rūpamiti vedanetyevamādikaḥ sarvābhiniveśaḥ sarvamanyanā |
SA14n1222:1255: sarvaparapravādibhirmārādibhiḥ kleśaiśca yāḥ kampanāḥ tāḥ sarveñjanāḥ |
SA14n1222:1266: sarvākārajñatā mārgajñatā sarvajñatā ceti trayametallakṣaṇaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ |
SA14n1222:1296: āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyā ekonatriṃśattamaḥ parivartaḥ ||
